version_description:
New design and upgraded functionality.
More options on transactions and payments, such as transfer to domestic and non-domestic banks, payment of other banks’ credit cards, load and unload your Virtual MasterCard, payment of Assessed Tax Debts, IKA and OAEE social insurance funds, EYDAP and EYATH water companies, EPA Attikis, e-pass, HOL, and more.

New services:
- Loans
- Virtual MasterCard
- ETHNOcash
- Debit MasterCard
- Change Password

New design and upgraded functionality.
More options on transactions and payments, such as transfer to domestic and non-domestic banks, payment of other banks’ credit cards, load and unload your Virtual MasterCard, payment of Assessed Tax Debts, IKA and OAEE social insurance funds, EYDAP and EYATH water companies, EPA Attikis, e-pass, HOL, and more.

New services:
- Loans
- Virtual MasterCard
- ETHNOcash
- Debit MasterCard
- Change Password

•Support for Sms i-code
•go4more points and transactions
•Time Deposits
•User Journal

Introducing 2017 Tax-Free Allowance. Find out your 2017 tax-free allowance built using NBG cards and digital channels, view your transactions in full detail and use the tax-free calculator to estimate the total amount of transactions you need to make based on your total income.

In difficult times we are all standing together.
In the new version we provide immediate relief and financial help to the victims of Attica wildfires, through the crowdfunding platform of Act4Greece.

Bug fix in the account and card section.
Bug fix in the account and card section.

New functionalities!
-Prepaid VISA: You can now issue the NBG prepaid card via your mobile
-Smart notifications: Get instant notifications every time you make a payment, receive your salary or make purchases with your card.
Discover the new experience of NBG Mobile Banking with a fresh, intuitive design and smart features to help you with your everyday financial management!

We added
-the cash withdrawal abroad limit
-the new Prepaid Voucher Mastercard

Budgets: Set limits on your monthly expenses and take control of your finances. Set a monthly budget for total spending in all categories or set custom budgets on selected categories.

Split transactions: You can now apply multiple categories to a single transaction (e.g. ATM withdrawal) by splitting the total transaction into smaller amounts.

Budgets: Set limits on your monthly expenses and take control of your finances. Set a monthly budget for total spending in all categories or set custom budgets on selected categories.

Split transactions: You can now apply multiple categories to a single transaction (e.g. ATM withdrawal) by splitting the total transaction into smaller amounts.

New security features for your debit cards!
- Report Lost/Stolen
- Temporarily freeze your card

Soon available for all card types

New security features for your debit cards!
- Report Lost/Stolen
- Temporarily freeze your card

Soon available for all card types

Did you lose your debit card and reported it as lost or stolen? You can now reissue it from the Management tab of the card.

You can also order a new Visa or Mastercard Debit Card and set up purchase and withdrawal limits.

And a bug fix for those who have Prepaid KA

And a bug fix for those who have Prepaid KA

Amazing news!
National Bank of Greece revolutionizes Greek banking! You can now become an NBG customer without visiting a branch!
Forget queues; with the new digital customer onboarding service, you can become an NBG customer instantly, open an account, get a debit card and credentials for digital banking exclusively via your mobile.

Update your app now!

Forget queues; with the new digital customer onboarding service, you can become an NBG customer instantly, open an account, get a debit card and credentials for digital banking exclusively via your mobile.

Update your app now!

o You can now pay by credit card DEI, road tax and other billers.
o We added more than 20 new bill payments.

o You can now pay by credit card DEI, road tax and other billers.
o We added more than 20 new bill payments.

New year, new features!

For total control of your purchases, you can now switch on and off:
• online purchases,
• POS transactions,
• contactless transactions,
• ATM withdrawals,
• transactions abroad and
• magnetic stripe transactions.

Do you want to save your money on a quick and easy way?
Open now a 3-month time deposit. All you will need is 1 minute of your time!

New year, new features!

For total control of your purchases, you can now switch on and off:
• online purchases,
• POS transactions,
• contactless transactions,
• ATM withdrawals,
• transactions abroad and
• magnetic stripe transactions.

Do you want to save your money on a quick and easy way?
Open now a 3-month time deposit. All you will need is 1 minute of your time!

•You can now unlock your card PIN via Mobile Banking!
•We updated the Tax-free Allowance Calculator according to the new rates for 2020

•You can now unlock your card PIN via Mobile Banking!
•We updated the Tax-free Allowance Calculator according to the new rates for 2020
- Find the nearest Branch and ATM through Mobile Banking
- Find the nearest Branch and ATM through Mobile Banking

Schedule your payments!

Post-dated payments are now available for credit cards and organizations that support this functionality.
To make things simpler, you can also save your credit card payment details for future use.

Schedule your payments!

Post-dated payments are now available for credit cards and organizations that support this functionality.
To make things simpler, you can also save your credit card payment details for future use.

Great News!
Now you can issue a Business Debit Mastercard and manage your card details

Great News!
Now you can issue a Business Debit Mastercard and manage your card details
- In addition to Debit and Prepaid cards, you can now issue a Virtual Prepaid for your online purchases!
- In addition to Debit and Prepaid cards, you can now issue a Virtual Prepaid for your online purchases!
All card management features are now available for Prepaid cards
All card management features are now available for Prepaid cards
All card management features are now available for Prepaid cards
All card management features are now available for Prepaid cards

Exciting news! Now you can:
- Send and request money from friends instantly, to NBG or other banks. All you need is their mobile number!
- Receive monthly reports on your income and spending

Exciting news! Now you can:
- Send and request money from friends instantly, to NBG or other banks. All you need is their mobile number!
- Receive monthly reports on your income and spending

• Discover Viber as the new way to receive your OTP, even when you are in areas with poor signal
• Minor bug fixes on mobile payments

• Discover Viber as the new way to receive your OTP, even when you are in areas with poor signal
• Minor bug fixes on mobile payments

Welcome our new summer release! Now you can:

- get a brand new credit card, Classic VISA or Classic Mastercard!
- open savings and current accounts!
- update your personal details, such as mobile phone, email, address, VAT number etc.

Love our app? Don’t forget to rate us! Your positive feedback really makes our day!

Welcome our new summer release! Now you can:

- get a brand new credit card, Classic VISA or Classic Mastercard!
- open savings and current accounts!
- update your personal details, such as mobile phone, email, address, VAT number etc.

Love our app? Don’t forget to rate us! Your positive feedback really makes our day!

New August update!
- Do you want a credit card? You can now apply for a VISA or Mastercard!
- Explore the new advanced card management features for extra safety! Activate your debit card & change your PIN without visiting an ATM and reset your contactless limit!

New August update!
- Do you want a credit card? You can now apply for a VISA or Mastercard!
- Explore the new advanced card management features for extra safety! Activate your debit card & change your PIN without visiting an ATM and reset your contactless limit!

Holidays are over, but no worries because now you can:
• find easily and quickly the i-bank statements for your banking products
• select the accounts and cards for which you wish to get push notifications

• find easily and quickly the i-bank statements for your banking products
• select the accounts and cards for which you wish to get push notifications

EXPRESS loan now available on your mobile!
- Apply, get approved and receive funds on your account within minutes
- From €300 to €2.000, without collateral

EXPRESS loan now available on your mobile!
- Apply, get approved and receive funds on your account within minutes
- From €300 to €2.000, without collateral

Now, you can insure your cards, easily and quickly from your mobile phone! “Card insurance” also offers compensation for personal items that may be lost along with your cards, such as bag, wallet, cell phone, etc.

Now, you can insure your cards, easily and quickly from your mobile phone! “Card insurance” also offers compensation for personal items that may be lost along with your cards, such as bag, wallet, cell phone, etc.

Moreover,
-For business users, new instant notifications for every transaction pending approval.

Now you can become an NBG customer easily and quickly from our application. If you have TAXISnet credentials, log in via the eGov-KYC service and become a customer without uploading any documents!
